subject: How are you doing today ? Well
body:
How are you doing today ? Well there is a lady called Mrs Mary
Polinice, she was in our office this morning trying to pay the
required fees of $50 to claim your funds. According to her statement
she stated that you're one of the victims car accident so we are
contacting you now to confirm if you're really dead or Alive?
Here is the information :
Your full name AND address:
Name of your Country/ City:
Cell/office address:
IDENTITY CARD/PHOTO
:
Current occupation:
Contact telephone number:
Thank Your
MR BENJAMIN PAUL

subject: Re: How are you doing today ? Well
body:
Hello Mr. Benjamin Paul,

I hope you're having a good day. I'm quite surprised to hear about this situation with Mrs. Mary Polinice. I can assure you that I am very much alive and well, thank goodness! 

As for the car accident, there seems to be some misunderstanding. Could you please provide more details about this incident? And how did Mrs. Polinice come to believe that I was involved in such an unfortunate event?

Also, could you explain more about these funds that she is trying to claim on my behalf? It's all a bit confusing.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carlos

subject: Mr Carlos Happy Sunday
body:
Mr Carlos I received your email and also understand understand what your
said that your don't know Mrs Mary is well because he will come back on
Monday and I will call the police to get her arrested but first are your
ready to pay the transfer fee to receive your Fund that's all I need to
know before calling the police so I will like to here from your to know
what's next ok

Benjamin
